participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Jovial and a bit sarcastic, he enjoys light-hearted banter.
participant_1.background: I'm a recording engineer and own my own studio. I live in California, but the recording artist market was dead last year. I'm a 46-year-old single dad with kids. My ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. I prefer being inside.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Empathetic and resilient, she handles challenges with grace.
participant_2.background: My father is in the army. I recently was fired and had to get a new job. I work in the insurance business. My mom passed away when I was young.

content.text: I 'm doing well, thanks. Where are you from?
